## hasDisplacementFeature() function

Determines whether a given material supports displacement maps for elevation overlay.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function hasDisplacementFeature(material: any): material is DisplacementFeature;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  material | any | The material to check. |

<b>Returns:</b>

material is [DisplacementFeature](./harp-materials.displacementfeature.md)

Whether the given material supports displacement maps for elevation overlay.
